Project Description
This project includes two Visual Studio 2008 templates to kick-start hosting WCF services in a WPF application, in addition to webcasts describing how to use them.

WPF ServiceHost Application Template
This Visual Studio 2008 template creates a new solution with two projects: a sample WPF client configured to host a sample WCF service, and a Console client to test calling the WPF-hosted service. The accompanying webcast walks you through the installation and explains the features provided by the generated solution.
  • Download the code here: WPF ServiceHost Application Template
  • Download the supporting video here: Hosting Services in WPF Clients

WPF Publish and Subscribe Application Template
This Visual Studio 2008 template creates a new solution with a WCF application service that publishes events to a WPF client application that subscribes to those events. The WPF client also hosts a WCF subscriber service. The accompanying webcast walks you through the installation and explains the features provided by the generated solution.
  • Download the code here: WPF Publish and Subscribe Application Template
  • Download the supporting video here: WPF Publish and Subscribe Application Template
